title: Powers (v1 - v4) (2009 - Ongoing) (Digital) (ZoneKing+Zone-Empir
description:
Powers (v1 - v4) (2009 - Ongoing) (Digital) (ZoneKing+Zone-Empire)


Powers is an on-going series started in 2000. It is written by Brian Michael Bendis and illustrated by Michael Avon Oeming. To date Powers has been collected into thirteen trade paperback volumes and four deluxe hardcover editions.Homicide Detectives Christian Walker and Enki Sunrise investigate murders specific to super hero cases... powers. Where super hero and crime comics explode into each other! 
A television adaptation of Powers will premiere in December 2014 on the PlayStation Network, the PSN's first original programming. The first two episodes of the series will be written by Charlie Huston and directed by David Slade
